headline: Carnival Crime Reporting Concerns Meet Valuation And Governance Questions For Investors
summary: Carnival Corporation & (NYSE:CCL) is facing scrutiny after underreporting onboard crime incidents. For Q4 2025, the company reported three crimes and no serious assaults, conflicting with independently identified cases. The gap in reported incidents highlights how cruise lines can interpret vague legal definitions when deciding what to disclose. Questions are emerging about guest safety, transparency, and whether current rules create enough accountability for cruise operators. Carnival...
